pages.text: 68|43|Tongshi, tamen shen zao lingru, bu gan yangshi. Er guoqu tamen jianquan de shihou, ceng bei zhao qu koutou.
68|44|Ni rang wo chengzhi fouren zhe xun ci de ren ba! Wo jiang shi tamen buzhi bu jue de jian qu yu huimie.
68|45|Wo yourong tamen, wo de jice que shi zhoumi de.
68|46|Ni xiang tamen suoqu baochou, jiao tamen danfu tai zhong ne?
68|47|Haishi tamen neng zhi youxuan, gu jiayi jilu ne?
68|48|Gu ni yingdang renshou ni de zhu de panjue, buyao xiang nage zangshen yu fu de ren yiyang. Dangshi, ta aozhe nu huyu ta de zhu;
68|49|jiaruo cong ta de zhu fachu de endian meiyou dadao ta, name, ta bi shou zebei di bei pao dao huangliang di difang.
68|50|Sihou, ta de zhu jianxuanle ta, bing shi ta ru yu shanren zhi lie.
68|51|Buxindao de renmen jihu yi tamen de numu shi ni diedao. Dang tamen ting dao xuandu jiaohui de shihou, tamen shuo:“Ta que shi yige fengzi.”
68|52|Zhe “gulanjing” bushi bie de, ta shi dui quan shijie de jiaohui.
69|3|Ni zenme neng renshi zhen zai shi shenme ne?
69|4|Sai mo de ren he a de ren, ceng fouren da nan.
69|5|Zhiyu sai mo de ren ne, yi wei yanxing suo huimie;
69|6|zhiyu a de ren, yi wei nuhou de baofeng suo huimie.
69|7|An la ceng shi baofeng duizhe tamen lian guale qiye ba zhou, ni kan a de ren dao zai dishang, haoxiang kongxin di hai zao shugan yiyang.
69|8|Ni neng kanjian tamen hai you jieyi ma?
